attributes.action: Create an independant Ombudsman for Parking Enforcement Companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The problem with the current parking enforcement companies is that they "review" tickets issued by their company and decide whether to enforce it or not.

I believe that this is somewhat onesided as it cannot be truely independant and think that this could be reviewed by a nationally independant review board.  This board would only cover private parking firms and give the individual a fair and independant hearing
